__e: Well, Mrs Doyle, there's more to football than you think.
It's why I gave him the house back, one night out a week for Mrs Doyle.
Ah, yeah, you're here to stay, with me, Mrs Doyle and Father Jack, for ever and ever and ever and ever and ever...
May I introduce myself? I'm Mrs Henderson.
You conned Mrs. Henderson into thinking you brought him back.
The only blood on it is Mrs. Henderson's.
I saw the ticket in Mrs Hughes' hand when she found it in the coat.
- Only I know Mrs Hughes is suffering from a condition and I wondered if there's anything I can do to help?
I've got an idea and I've told Mrs Hughes but I want you to know it.

Mrs Johnson says some of them have been made by machine!
Obviously you'll believe what you want... - but I just helped you more than you know.
